ygData.subject: Re: crookstinger.  Magic weapon ****SPOILER****
ygData.msgSnippet: There are three orc camps.  One near end of path, one just passed the wood elf camp (just southwest of it), and the last on the far west side of the zone
ygData.messageBody:
There are three orc camps. One near end of path, one just passed the wood elf camp (just southwest of it), and the last on the far west side of the zone (passed the wood elf camp from the end of the path, just a bit further north.) The only one even near a path is the first one, so I'll assume thats the one. Thank you for your help.

Drev

> Crookstinger always seemed to be around the Orc Camp by the end of a path.
> He just sort of wanders through and seems to be a rare spawn as is Old
> Dimmshimmer and the queen spider (she is named also).
>
> I killed crookstinger by the Orc Camp (end of path). Wish I had a better
> description of the orc camp im talking about but there are only 2 orc camps
> ther that I know of. One orc camp is by the Wood Elf camp(thats NOT the
> right area).
